paper_abstract: We obtain asymptotically tight algorithmic bounds for MAX-CUT and EDGE DOMINATING SET problems on graphs of bounded clique-width. We show that on an n-vertex graph of clique-width t both problems (1) cannot be solved in time f(t) n(o(t)) for any function f of t unless exponential time hypothesis fails, and (2) can be solved in time n(O(t)).
paper_title: ALMOST OPTIMAL LOWER BOUNDS FOR PROBLEMS PARAMETERIZED BY CLIQUE-WIDTH
